name: Final Fharmacy I
description:
You are an apprentice alchemist who works at a pharmacy in the countryside. Your master, a famous witch of renown, has been called away to fight in the ongoing Dragon War. Can you keep the pharmacy in one piece while you await the return of your master? And while you're at it, your efforts might just bring the war to an end...

Learn the recipes to mix ingredients and brew potions of all sorts as fast as you can to cure the never-ending flood of patients, who are afflicted with RPG-style wounds and status debuffs! As time goes on, more and more patients will need saving from more debilitating ailments: don't let anyone die in this fast-paced triage simulator!

Inspired by skillful management games like Cook, Serve, Delicious, Trauma Center, and of course, the Final Fantasy series!

Four different endings depending on the actions you choose - will you unlock them all?

Featuring the wonderful chiptunes of Vincenti Zghra!

Expected playtime for story completion - 30-45 minutes
